title: [MINDSET] Ep. 161 How To Build Self-Confidence w/ Elle Russ
description:
How often do you stand in your worth with confidence?

 

This week Ash talks with Elle Russ an author, TV and film writer, and Podcast host to discuss how to build your self-confidence and build your mindset health. 

 

It is so easy to share the struggles of those who aren’t confident, and yet, when you are confident, alpha, and powerful, there are a surprising handful of pitfalls to overcome. Listen in to learn how to navigate both ends of the spectrum and be truly confident. Elle shares the value of vulnerability, tools to be confident, and accessible.  

 

Being shy doesn’t mean you can’t be confident. Elle walks through what confidence actually is and how you can become more confident in your own way. Ash and Elle walk through navigating social media, narcissism, overgiving, and no longer letting yourself be a victim. 

 

Resources:

Confident As Fu*k by Elle Russ

Paleo Thyroid Solution by Elle Russ

 

In This Episode, You Will Learn:

  1. The pitfalls of confident people and alpha females.
  2. True confidence versus performance confidence.
  3. What is personal and what is private.
  4. An alternative perspective on being humble and how to speak well about yourself with grace.

 

Where You Can Find Elle Russ:

https://www.elleruss.com/

Primal Blueprint Podcast

 

--

 

Promotion:

Want to upgrade your health? Visit organifi.com/youturn and enter code YOUTURN to get 20% off at check out! 

 

Here are some of Ash’s favorite goodies to put in your next coffee, tea, water or smoothie:

 

✨Pure Powder: Lion’s Main extract, aloe vera and ginger extract are just a few of the superfoods packed into this powder to improve your mental clarity and overall brain health.

 

🥬Green Powder: Packed with spirulina, chlorella, and ashwagandha, to increase your immunity and aid your digestive tract.

 

🍦Vanilla or Chocolate Protein Powder: A soy-free, dairy-free, 100% vegan protein that tastes like a milkshake and yet is packed with amino acids and MCT’s to speed up metabolism, quench cravings and improve recovery.

 

🌟Gold powder-  A yummy anti-inflammatory superfood powder packed with reishi mushrooms, turmeric, cinnamon and magnesium to support restful relaxation and recovery.



Promotion:

Visit YouTurnBook.com to get a copy of Ashley’s NEW book— You Turn: Get Unstuck, Discover Your Direction & Design Your Dream Career! 

 

With your early order of this book you can gain access to a FREE bundle of courses with more than 25 hours of content on money mindset, launching a side hustle and life purpose. 

 

Enter a picture of your book receipt at ashleystahl.com/claimbundle to gain access to the free courses while you can! They’re valued at more than $2,500 and have been gifted for FREE from some of Ashley’s favorite self help leaders!
